heroSubtitle: From backend to frontend, I develop functional, reliable and scalable web applications. I believe in simple, yet effective solutions that make a strong impression.
budgetPlusDesc: An accounting application designed to simplify everyday tasks.
reliaBillDesc: An invoicing application for small businesses and agencies.
workTogetherDescription: I'm always open to new projects and collaboration opportunities. Feel free to reach out to discuss how we can work together.
csvExporterDesc: An application for exporting data from a database to CSV format.
